text: Ara e'ibhabe tomara prabhu tomake manonita karabena, ara tomake siksa debena ghatanabalira byakhya samparke, ara tamra anugraha purnanga karabena tomara prati o iyakubera bansadharadera prati, yemana tini ta purnanga karechilena era age tomara purbapurusa ibrahima o isahakera prati. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu sarbajnata, paramajnani.â€™â€™
